'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [quest](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireQuests/) in {{poe2}}. It was added in version 5.0.0[https://eternity.obsidian.net/news/pillars-of-eternity-ii-deadfire-update-61---patch-50---the-return-of-the-ultimate Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire Update 61 - Patch 5.0 - The Return of the Ultimate] - Official Site[https://forums.obsidian.net/topic/109341-update-61-patch-update-50-the-return-of-the-ultimate Update #61 - Patch Update 5.0 - The Return of the Ultimate] - Obsidian Forums, and is started alongside the [Magran's Fires](/magransFiresTheUltimate/) challenge of the same name. ## Synopsis {{Description|Seek out the deadliest foes in the Deadfire Archipelago and defeat them.}} ## Walkthrough * This quest is likely the toughest challenge that a player will ever face in ''Deadfire''. It enables all [God Challenges](/magransFires/), Trial of Iron, Path of the Damned, and Solo mode all at once, making the game extremely difficult. As with other God challenges, console commands and mods are disabled. The main objective is to defeat a number of powerful enemies, as listed below. {| class="wikitable" ! Objective ! Enemy !
